title: Create Interview with Job Description
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job description and click save
Verify that the AI suggests questions based on the job description
expected_result: The interview creation page displays suggested questions based on the job description

title: Create Interview with Enhanced JD Feature
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job title (e.g. JavaScript developer with AWS experience)
Click on the enhanced JD feature
Verify that the AI generates a complete job description
expected_result: The interview creation page displays a generated job description based on the job title

title: Edit and Save Job Description
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job description and click save
Edit the job description and click save again
Verify that the changes are saved
expected_result: The edited job description is saved and displayed on the interview creation page

title: Select Skill Recommendations
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job description and click save
Verify that the AI suggests skill recommendations
Select a skill recommendation and verify that it is added to the interview
expected_result: The selected skill recommendation is added to the interview

title: Add Custom Skill
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job description and click save
Verify that the AI suggests skill recommendations
Add a custom skill and verify that it is added to the interview
expected_result: The custom skill is added to the interview

title: Configure Difficulty Level of Questions
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job description and click save
Verify that the AI suggests questions
Configure the difficulty level of a question and verify that it is saved
expected_result: The difficulty level of the question is saved and displayed on the interview creation page

title: Create Standard Questions
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job description and click save
Verify that the AI suggests standard questions
Add a standard question and verify that it is added to the interview
expected_result: The standard question is added to the interview

title: Create Role-Based Questions
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job description and click save
Verify that the AI suggests role-based questions
Add a role-based question and verify that it is added to the interview
expected_result: The role-based question is added to the interview

title: Create Interview with Advanced Plan Features
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job description and click save
Verify that the AI suggests questions
Select an AI avatar and verify that it is saved
expected_result: The AI avatar is saved and displayed on the interview creation page

title: Create Interview and Get Unique Public Link
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job description and click save
Verify that the AI suggests questions
Click on the create option and verify that a unique public link is generated
expected_result: A unique public link is generated and displayed on the interview creation page

title: Verify Candidate Interview Response

steps.expected: structured answers and video recordings along with scores and resumes

expected_result: Candidate's responses are displayed with structured answers, video recordings, scores, and resumes

title: Verify AI Analysis Summary
expected_result: AI analysis summary is displayed with observations, positives, and negatives

title: Verify Action Button Functionality
expected_result: Action button allows selecting or rejecting the candidate

title: Verify Resume Screening Functionality
expected_result: Resume screening process commences upon uploading résumés

title: Verify AI Ré Score and Recommendation
expected_result: AI ré score and recommendation are displayed
